page.title: 18EATING OUT
page.content: Price ranges of a meal at:- {Flower Pot:}pies 30p, beans 25p, coffee 30p {Swifty's:}chips 25p, coke 25p and 18p hamburgers 40p,hot-dogs 30p,coffee 20p {Pub grub:}sandwiches 75p, hot meals Â£1.25 to Â£2.00, sweets 50p to 75p; drinks from the bar. {Steeton Hall:}Meals from Â£6.50 Cold Plate - various meats,salad etc. Hot meals - roast meats with various vegetables. Desserts - gateaux etc {Kildwick Hall:}Starters - fish and meat spreads with salad and sauces Â£2.85 to Â£6.95. Main course - roast meats Â£7.15 to Â£10.75; plus vegetables at Â£2.50. Sweets: choice of sweets; coffee and mints. {Bella Napoli:}Pizzas from Â£1.50, Pasta from Â£2.30,Steak from Â£3.80, extra vegetables 55p, selection from sweet trolley 75p.
